COMMUNITY BENEFITS
ADVISORY COMMITTEE
REGULAR MEETING
~ AGENDA ~
2:00 â€“ 4:00 PM

Thursday, February 13, 2020

City Hall, Ackermann Room

Overview
The Community Benefits Advisory Committee will meet to further advance its overall strategy toward
fulfilling its purpose and acting on the Guiding Principles for Community Benefits Funding set forth in the
Community Needs Assessment.
I. Introduction & Approval of Minutes
II. Review of Plans for Implementation
III. Next Meeting & Next Steps
IV. Adjournment

City of Cambridge
